_header: Eftsoons yet John as he did ere
_description: Gospel for Friday after Fourth Sunday in Advent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Eft sones ȝit iohn als he did areOf ihesu crist witnes he bare…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And for to wend here in his wayAnd cum to lif þat lastes ay
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feria vi quarte ebdomade aduentus domini Euangelium secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 10ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.199-200.
